attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I strongly object to your treatment of the Gurkhas who have helped this this country in times of war and now not letting them settle here, and at the same time letting any Tom Dick and Harry settle here. I consider your attitude very distasteful.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call to action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
